revision.comment: Created page with "{{codepointer|r=Hexen|Weapon}} '''A_MStaffPalette''' (no parameters) Decrements the counter {{c|MStaffCount}} if it is greater than zero. This will cause the [[palette blend..."
revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Hexen|Weapon}} '''A_MStaffPalette'''
(no parameters)
Decrements the counter {{c|MStaffCount}} if it is greater than zero. This will cause the [[palette blend]] to change.
This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|MWeapBloodscourge}} and derived classes.
